repositories.author: major
repositories.name: MySQLTuner-perl
repositories.description: MySQLTuner is a script written in Perl that will assist you with your MySQL configuration and make recommendations for increased performance and stability.

repositories.author: darold
repositories.name: ora2pg
repositories.description: Ora2Pg is a free tool used to migrate an Oracle database to a PostgreSQL compatible schema. It connects your Oracle database, scan it automaticaly and extracts its structure or data, it then generates SQL scripts that you can load into PostgreSQL.
